channel.title: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~
channel.description:
> # **[color=grey]The Witch [/color]** > *[color=grey]Neutral Killer [/color]* > > **Passive (Potion Adaption)** - You are familier with many potions, including the ones that make you death, occupation, and redirection immune. You will appear to have been redirected/occupied to classes that may use it on you (Unless **Change Form** is used) > > **Day Ability (Change Form)** - Select one of three potions from your collection to deceive the BD. The options for this are: *Appear occupation and redirection immune tonight.* *Appear to be BD tonight, and your visits will be hidden to tracking abilities.* *Appear to be a class type of choice to the princess, seeker, and mastermind tonight*. *_3 uses_* > > **Day Ability (Potion of Deception)** - Tonight, the selected player will receive the selected notifications. The options for this are : Wolfed( their class card will appear to be bleeding and they will be "healed" the next night. If a healer tries to heal them they will get the notification for healing a bleed),Attacked and healed, or occupied (they will not get their night results). *_3 uses_* > > **Night Ability (Potion of Poison)** - Attack the selected player. *_Infinite Uses_* > > **Night Ability (The bomb of prophecy)** - Attack a player with a extraordinary attack. This attack is guarenteed to kill, it bypasses heal, guards, and night immunity. The only way this can be stopped is if the target is jailed. If they are jailed this will **not** be refunded. *1 use* *Not usable until n2*
Goal: Same as reaper and poss :p
Suggestions are appreciated and helpful, please leave an opinion!

item.title: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
TheVideoChipmunk:

The only way this can be stopped is if the target is jailed. If they are jailed this will not be refunded.

In order for this to be consistent this means that it does not bypass Merc, Enforcer or Poacher either.

item.title: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
I feel like we have enough bleeding as it is, im not sure nks need it. Witch has a fake bleed thats useful for claiming hunter and phys, but it has no kill potential. Turning poison to a bleed is a good idea though, wolf should still stay a night ability imo

Read full topic

make wolf a day ability.
make assassin nightshade into bleeding.
Then make some NK’S have bleeds. and ez.

item.title: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
Yes, but, this attack seems like it needs a way of being avoided, or else its pretty much an attack just to kill prince, or maybe a late game mm. But the reason its not refunded is so when and if the bd knows there is a witch, get someone to claim prince and jail him, and hope the witch wasted their ability. If it was refunded, it is near innvitable for princes death.

Read full topic

item.source: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~

item.title: The Witch - A NK idea with many claimable classes~
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
The Witch

Neutral Killer

Passive (Potion Adaption) - You are familier with many potions, including the ones that make you death, occupation, and redirection immune. You will appear to have been redirected/occupied to classes that may use it on you (Unless Change Form is used)

Day Ability (Change Form) - Select one of three potions from your collection to deceive the BD. The options for this are: Appear occupation and redirection immune tonight. Appear to be BD tonight, and your visits will be hidden to tracking abilities. Appear to be a class type of choice to the princess, seeker, and mastermind tonight. 3 uses

Day Ability (Potion of Deception) - Tonight, the selected player will receive the selected notifications. The options for this are : Wolfed( their class card will appear to be bleeding and they will be “healed” the next night. If a healer tries to heal them they will get the notification for healing a bleed),Attacked and healed, or occupied (they will not get their night results). 3 uses

Night Ability (Potion of Poison) - Attack the selected player. Infinite Uses

Night Ability (The bomb of prophecy) - Attack a player with a extraordinary attack. This attack is guarenteed to kill, it bypasses heal, guards, and night immunity. The only way this can be stopped is if the target is jailed. If they are jailed this will not be refunded. 1 use Not usable until n2

Goal: Same as reaper and poss

Suggestions are appreciated and helpful, please leave an opinion!

Read full topic
